long_description: Filtrate Atlas Polarized Sunglasses for women feature a handmade acetate frame for great style as well as superb eye protection any sunny day of the year. Polarized lenses cut 99% of glare from water, snow, and other flat surfaces for enhanced visibility and color contrast. High-quality polycarbonate lenses provide 100% protection from harmful UV rays and block 90% of visible light. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight and up to 10 times more impact resistant than glass or plastic. Filtrate RAW frames are handmade of unrefined acetate so that every pair has a unique organic look and feel.
short_description: Filtrate Atlas Polarized Sunglasses for women feature a handmade acetate frame for great style as well as superb eye protection any sunny day of the year.
